title: urgent security mattter
content: Dear Mozilla Trust & Safety Team, I am writing to formally express serious concerns regarding potential fraud, data breaches, and violations of my rights that directly affect my children. These incidents have created an ongoing threat to our safety, privacy, and well-being, and I am requesting your urgent attention and investigation. Specifically: Potential Data Breach: I am concerned that personal or sensitive information related to my family, including my children, may have been accessed, shared, or misused without consent. Fraud and Misrepresentation: There are ongoing issues that suggest fraudulent activity or misrepresentation that could be affecting accounts, communications, or digital platforms associated with my family. Rights Violations: My parental rights and the safety of my children are being compromised through these activities. This may involve unauthorized access to our information or interference in our digital lives. Child Safety Concerns: Given the seriousness of the potential breaches and unauthorized activity, I am deeply concerned about the direct impact on my children’s privacy and safety. I request the following actions from Mozilla: Immediate review of any accounts, data, or activity associated with my information or my children’s information. Confirmation if there has been any unauthorized access or suspicious activity. Guidance on steps I should take to secure our information and prevent further potential violations. Documentation or evidence of any actions taken to address this matter. Please treat this matter with the urgency it deserves. I am prepared to provide any information necessary to facilitate your review, including emails, account information, or other supporting evidence. I appreciate your prompt attention to this critical issue and look forward to your response. Sincerely, Tabitha (Beth) Poore-Jones (formerly Haefs, formerly Starkson) children initials AJH, CRH, KJW, MBP and I JG

title: Avviando Firefox dopo riavvio del PC, persa la configurazione delle schede
content: Ciao, ho molto apprezzato la nuova modalità verticale delle schede e il raggruppamento delle schede e avevo organizzato tutte le schede in modo molto pratico. Si salvano automaticamente alla chiusura di windows e si riaprono. Tutto bene. Qualche giorno fa ho acceso il PC (Notebook Delll con windows 10) e le schede erano assenti; tutto il lavoro di organizzazione perso. La cosa mi era già successa in passato, avevo aperto un ticket e non eravamo riusciti a risolvere, anche perché io non posso lasciare il PC "fermo" in attesa di una soluzione che potrebbe richiedere giorni. Io vorrei avere un modo di poter salvare integralmente la configurazione di Firefox, come posso fare il backup dei preferiti e ripristinarlo. Una soluzione file based. Ricordo che sono anche un sostenitore economico di Mozilla, e ogni anno faccio una piccola donazione perché credo nello sviluppo indipendente di Mozilla. grazie per il supporto.

content: The top two toggles in the "location" area of privacy settings are OFF. Greyed out.
